texts.DuplicatePhoneNumber: The phone number has been used by others
texts.PhoneNumberStartsWithZero: Phone number can not start with 0
texts.PhoneNumberNotRegisterd: There is not any registered user with requested phone number!
texts.NonNumericPhoneNumber: Non-numeric phone number is not allowed
texts.RegisterCodeCacheSeconds: Register Verification Code Cache Time In Seconds
texts.Description:IdentityService.PhoneNumberL: The valid time for the user to send SMS verification code, unit m, default 2min
When the user logs in, he/she should send the template number of the SMS verification code and fill in the template number of the corresponding cloud platform registration
